resources.string:
As a responsible company, Bistel is committed to protect and respect the privacy of its users. Our Privacy Policy captures and processes the personal information that is provided to us voluntarily by the user or is captured by us when you visit our website. The information we capture helps us in identifying you and understanding your requirements carefully. The personal information captured by us includes username, IP address, phone number, location, email address and so on. Our database maintain the records of all these captured personal information.
